nodes.description: Bashir Bilour, Haroon Bilour's father, was martyred in a 2012 suicide attack in Peshawar's Qissa Khawani Bazaar
nodes.support_text: Bashir Bilour, father of Haroon Bilour, had embraced martyrdom in a suicide attack on December 22, 2012 in Peshawar's Qissa Khawani Bazaar.

nodes.description: ANP candidate Haroon Bilour's suicide blast occurred during a corner meeting in Peshawar's Yakatoot area on Tuesday night
nodes.support_text: The blast took place in Yakatoot area of Peshawar when a corner meeting of ANP was underway.

nodes.description: Bomber targeted Haroon Bilour's vehicle and detonated near him during fireworks
nodes.support_text: Bomber blew himself up near Haroon Bilour during fireworks.

nodes.description: Haroon Bilour succumbed to injuries at Lady Reading Hospital after being rushed there
nodes.support_text: Haroon Bilour was rushed to Lady Reading Hospital, where he succumbed to his wounds.

nodes.description: 12 casualties were confirmed, including Haroon Bilour, with death toll potentially rising
nodes.support_text: At least 12 people, including ANP candidate Haroon Bilour, were killed and 30 others sustained injuries in a suicide blast...

nodes.description: Rescue and police teams responded to the explosion site, transferring伤者 to hospitals
nodes.support_text: Rescuers and police teams rushed to the site and shifted the injured to nearby hospitals.

nodes.description: 目击者称在爆炸现场目击到爆炸发生
Haroon Bilour 参与PK-87选区ANP政党选举
nodes.support_text: Haroon Bilour 参与PK-87选区ANP政党选举

nodes.description: Daniyal Bilour 是爆炸事件中的受伤者之一
nodes.support_text: 据称 Daniyal Bilour 是受伤者之一

nodes.description: 警察和排爆队向Geo TV报告自杀式爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: 警察和排爆队向Geo TV报告自杀式爆炸事件

edges.support_text: Bashir Bilour...2012 in Peshawar's Qissa Khawani Bazaar. ANP candidate Haroon Bilour's suicide blast occurred during a corner meeting in Peshawar's Yakatoot area on Tuesday night.
The blast took place... ANP was underway. Haroon Bilour was rushed to Lady Reading Hospital...
The blast took place... ANP was underway. Rescuers and police teams rushed to the site...
爆炸发生后目击者进行陈述
爆炸发生后确认Daniyal Bilour为受伤者之一
自杀爆炸发生前30人受伤的语义描述需要关联到具体事件节点
爆炸发生后，警察和排爆队向Geo TV进行事件报告
Bomber blew himself up near Haroon Bilour during fireworks. The blast took place in Yakatoot area of Peshawar when a corner meeting of ANP was underway.
Bomber blew himself up near Haroon Bilour during fireworks. Rescuers and police teams rushed to the site...
Haroon Bilour succumbed to his wounds. The death toll is feared to go up as some of those injured in the explosion are in critical condition.
At least 12 people... were killed. Rescuers and police teams rushed to the site...
目击者陈述后官方确认伤亡
Haroon Bilour 在ANP政党选举中参与PK-87选区活动后遭遇自杀爆炸
